TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class RSA Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm inherit.

span.span: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the algorithm inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充此類別可證明您實作`RSA`索引鍵。Extending this class proves that you are implementing an `RSA` key. 這是必要的任何提供新的開發人員`RSA`重要的實作。This is required for any developer providing a new `RSA` key implementation. 這個類別的唯一目的是做為階層成員，來識別`RSA`演算法。The only purpose of this class is as a hierarchy member for identification of the `RSA` algorithm. 可在有安裝 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 的情況下，支援從 384 位元到 16384 位元長度的金鑰 (以 8 位元的單位累加)。The supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. 它可在有安裝 Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 的情況下，支援從 384 位元到 512 位元長度的金鑰 (以 8 位元的單位累加)。It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.

summary.span: Initializes an object from the key information from an XML string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化使用所產生的 XML 字串中使用的金鑰資訊的 RSA 物件方法。The initializes an RSA object using key information in an XML string that was generated using the method. 方法會接受包含公開金鑰的 XML 字串或包含公用和私用金鑰的 XML 字串。The method accepts either an XML string containing a public key or an XML string containing a public and private key. 使用方法，以方便地初始化金鑰資訊。Use the method to conveniently initialize key information. > [!CAUTION] > 包含不安全的位置的私用金鑰的 XML 字串保存是一項安全性威脅。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 您的應用程式的安全性可能洩露出去，如果惡意的第三方能存取您的私密金鑰。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保存私密金鑰，使用安全的金鑰容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 如需金鑰容器中的保存私密金鑰的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 儲存非對稱金鑰在金鑰容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md).

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: The format of the parameter is not valid.

span.span: The format of the parameter is not valid.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToXmlString(bool includePrivateParameters) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToXmlString (includePrivateParameters As Boolean) As String

override this.ToXmlString : bool -> string

param.name: includePrivateParameters
param.span: to include a public and private RSA key; to include only the public key.

span.span: to include a public and private RSA key; to include only the public key.

summary.span: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current object.

span.span: Creates and returns an XML string containing the key of the current object.

returns.span: An XML string containing the key of the current object.

span.span: An XML string containing the key of the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會建立 XML 字串，包含目前的公用和私用金鑰物件，或包含只在目前的公開金鑰物件。The method creates an XML string that contains either the public and private key of the current object or contains only the public key of the current object. 使用每當您需要方便地保存 RSA 金鑰資訊的方法。Use the method whenever you need to conveniently persist RSA key information. 若要初始化物件中的 XML 字串，而使用的金鑰方法。To initialize an object with the key in an XML string, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 包含不安全的位置的私用金鑰的 XML 字串保存是一項安全性威脅。Persisting an XML string containing a private key to an insecure location is a security threat. 您的應用程式的安全性可能洩露出去，如果惡意的第三方能存取您的私密金鑰。The security of your application can be compromised if a malicious third party can access your private key. 若要安全地保存私密金鑰，使用安全的金鑰容器。To safely persist a private key, use a secure key container. 如需金鑰容器中的保存私密金鑰的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 儲存非對稱金鑰在金鑰容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about persisting private keys in a key container, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). 當您傳遞`true`至方法，產生的 XML 字串會採用下列格式：When you pass `true` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … …

…

… … … … … ``` 當您傳遞`false`至方法，產生的 XML 字串會採用下列格式：When you pass `false` to the method, the resulting XML string takes the following form: ``` … … ```
